![](https://www.hostnamaste.com/images/OpenVZ-LET-Offers.png "")

**[OpenVZ VPS from $15/year in Jacksonville, Florida, USA and France, Europe Locations - HostNamaste](https://www.hostnamaste.com/openvz-vps.php "OpenVZ VPS from $15/year in Jacksonville, Florida, USA and France, Europe Locations - HostNamaste")**

“**[HostNamaste](https://www.hostnamaste.com "HostNamaste")** is a company that was started in March 2016 and has continued to offer hosting ever since. We are focused primarily in the LowEnd Market, but it is our philosophy to provide quality services while within the LowEnd market’s price range. While this is certainly the goal of many LowEnd hosting companies, we have been quietly providing our services for nearly 4 years with no complaints or issues whatsoever. We are particularly proud to offer many features that cannot often be offered by many LowEnd companies, including 24/7 Support, a 07-day money back guarantee, RAID-10 disks and dual processor nodes.”

We are a registered business in the State of Rajkot, Gujarat, India and currently accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, Alipay, WebMoney, Payoneer, Wallets, Bank Transfers and other **[Payment Methods](https://www.hostnamaste.com/clients/knowledgebase/6/Payments-We-Accept.html "Payment Methods")**. You can find our **[TOS/Legal](https://www.hostnamaste.com/tos.php "TOS/Legal")** Docs here and their **[AUP](https://www.hostnamaste.com/aup.php "AUP")** here.

**Here are the OpenVZ VPS Specials:**

**1) OpenVZ-1024**

* 1024 MB Memory
* 1024 MB vSWAP
* 30 GB Storage
* 1 TB Bandwidth
* 1 x CPU Cores
* 1 x IPv4 Address
* 1 x IPv6 Address
* 500Mbps to 1Gbps Uplink
* OpenVZ + SolusVM
* TUN/TAP/PPP Supported
* PTR/rDNS Supported
* Multiple Operating Systems
* **$15/Year  (Use Coupon: 1GB-OVZ-US-FRANCE)**
* **[ORDER NOW](https://www.hostnamaste.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=44&promocode=1GB-OVZ-US-FRANCE "ORDER NOW")**

**2) OpenVZ-2048**

* 2048 MB Memory
* 2048 MB vSWAP
* 50 GB Storage
* 2 TB Bandwidth
* 2 x CPU Cores
* 1 x IPv4 Address
* 1 x IPv6 Address
* 500Mbps to 1Gbps Uplink
* OpenVZ + SolusVM
* TUN/TAP/PPP Supported
* PTR/rDNS Supported
* Multiple Operating Systems
* **$30/Year (Use Coupon: 2GB-OVZ-US-FRANCE)**
* **[ORDER NOW](https://www.hostnamaste.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=45&promocode=2GB-OVZ-US-FRANCE "ORDER NOW")**

**Network and Data Centers Information:**

* **Jacksonville Florida, USA**
* Looking Glass: **https://www.hostnamaste.com/datacenter-jacksonville.php**

* **Roubaix/Strasbourg, France, Europe**

**Minimum Host Node Specifications:**

* Dual Intel Xeon E5-2660v2 CPU
* 64 GB RAM
* 6 x 1TB HDDs and SSDs
* Software RAID10
* 500Mbps to 1Gbps Uplink

Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy the offers!
